Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card.cardObjective

Interface CalculateScoreStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainDiagonalStrategy, PileBottomLeftStrategy, PileBottomRightStrategy, PileTopLeftStrategy, PileTopRightStrategy, RequirementStrategy, SecondaryDiagonalStrategy
public interface CalculateScoreStrategy
This interface defines the method for calculating Objective card points.

    • calculateScore

      int calculateScore(Codex codex, int point, ArrayList<Value> parameters)
      Method for calculating points.
      Parameters:
      codex - The codex on which points must be calculated.
      point - The points of the card.
      parameters - Parameters used to calculate the points.
      Returns:
